comments:
Europa PDE won't start plugins -- how can I remedy this?

-- Error Log --
Date: Sat Aug 18 11:19:00 EDT 2007
Message: Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.equinox.launcher
Stack Trace:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:501)
at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:443)
at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:1169)
at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:1144)
EclipseStarter is in the org.eclipse.osgi bundle.  Is this bundle in your target?  Is it included in the launch config?

After I explicitly removed all 'old' versions of extensions ( Software Updates/Manage Configuration -> select to uninstall old duplicate versions ), the launcher worked.  Unknown as to which old extension was causing the issue - I just removed everything that had been superseded.
